text: Ezɨ Asirian atrivimɨn gumazir dapanir kam kamaghɨn a ikaragha ghaze, “Nan atrivim akar kam ia ko ian atrivimra, mɨkɨmasa na amadazir puvatɨ. Puvatɨ. Gumazir dɨvazim gisɨn tuivighav itiba, me uaghan akar kam baragham. Guizbangɨra, mɨdorozim otoghtɨ, e Jerusalem koroghtɨ, dughiar kuram bar ia batogham. Eghtɨ ia gumazir dɨvazim gisɨn tuivighav itiba, ia bar dagheba puvatɨghɨva, uan buaribar amɨva, uan mɨsɨzir pabar amam.”
